Package metrics

Class F1Score<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>

java.lang.Object
metrics.AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T>
metrics.F1Score<T>
Type Parameters:
T - a generic type for the class that extends Comparable
All Implemented Interfaces:
MultipleScore<T>
public class F1Score<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
extends AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T>
This is a class that extends the AbstractMultipleCategoryScore. It implements the calculation of a score using the F1Score formula. This class receives a ConfusionMatrix object that must be set (in it's constructor). In alternative one can pass a list of predictions and a list of real classifications of generic type (as long as the type implements the Comparable interface)
Since:
2020-05-03
Version:
1.0.0
Author:
Marcelo Jacinto, David Souto, Gonçalo Tomás
See Also:
MultipleScore, SingleScore, F1PerClass, ConcreteConfusionMatrix, ConfusionMatrix

  • Method Details

    • doGetScores

      protected java.util.List<java.lang.Double> doGetScores()
      A method to return the list of Doubles with the calculated scores for each class of the ConfusionMatrix as well as a weighted average of all results in the last element of the list
      Specified by:
      doGetScores in class AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      Returns:
      A List of Double with the scores for each class + a weighted average of all scores in the last element

    • doGetLabels

      protected java.util.List<T> doGetLabels()
      A method that returns a List of generic type that extend Comparables. This list contains the labels for each score and contains 1 less element than the list of scores ( as the last score is a weighted average of the other scores).
      Specified by:
      doGetLabels in class AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      Returns:
      A List of generic type that extends comparable with the labels of each class

    • doGetScoreName

      protected java.lang.String doGetScoreName()
      A method that returns a String with the name of the score used to calculate the scores
      Specified by:
      doGetScoreName in class AbstractMultipleCategoryScore<T extends java.lang.Comparable<T>>
      Returns:
      A String with the name of the score formula used
